items.content_html: A lightweight, optimistic navigation state manager demo for Next.js. Built on an observer pattern with Captain & Sailor components, it delivers immediate client-side loading feedback and seamless UI transitions during route changes.
items.title: Yazi27/next-sail: A lightweight, optimistic navigation state manager demo for Next.js. Built on an observer pattern with Captain & Sailor components, it delivers immediate client-side loading feedback and seamless UI transitions during route changes.

items.content_html: Chat-Super is a lightweight, hassle-free chat application that lets you connect with others instantly without the need for sign-ups or accounts. Built with Next.js, Socket.io, and Tailwind CSS, this app is perfect for private conversations and collaborative chats.
